title: US jury awards $25m in damages over far-right rally
content: Those injured in Charlottesville accused organisers of conspiring to commit racially motivated violence.

title: US jury awards $25m in damages over far-right rally
content: Those injured in Charlottesville accused organisers of conspiring to commit racially motivated violence.

title: US pharmacies found guilty of fuelling opioid crisis
content: A federal court finds Walgreens, CVS and Walmart helped create an oversupply of addictive painkillers.

title: Deadly bus inferno survivors fled through window
content: At least 46 people, including 12 children, died when the vehicle caught fire on a Bulgarian motorway.

title: Yalda Hakim: My return to Afghanistan
content: The BBC's Yalda Hakim - who was born in Afghanistan - reports on the impact of 100 days of Taliban rule.

title: Ethiopia escalation prompts foreign exodus call
content: Germany and France are the latest countries to advise citizens to leave, as the UN relocates staff.

title: Olivia Rodrigo dominates Grammy Award nominations
content: The freshly-minted pop star is up for the night's four biggest awards, including album of the year.

title: Einstein relativity document sells for record €11m
content: The manuscript shows Einstein's attempts to formulate his theory of relativity.
